    • getAll

      public List<ManagerPlusResponse> getAll​(boolean active, boolean scaduto)
      Gets all managers with request associated, based on parames.
      Parameters:
      active - true if you want manager active
      scaduto - true if you want manager with no renewal done until now (only if active is true)
      Returns:
      all managers finded
